price: “Gooftaa kiyya! Odoon (addunyaa irratti) nama argu ta’ee jiruu (har’a) maaliif jaamaa gootee na kaafte?” jedha.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
